ComicInfo.Title: Rightful Owners Part 1: Many Happy Returns
ComicInfo.Summary: DUCKTALES is back! The hit Disney Afternoon TV show makes a splash this month as an all-new, original ongoing comic book series! Written by the creator of the EPIC MICKEY video game and illustrated by the fan-favorite Disney duck artist Miquel Pujol, this is the latest and greatest revival of the Disney Afternoon Revolution that “might solve a mystery,” but will definitely “rewrite history!” Existing within the same continuity as BOOM!’s hit series DARKWING DUCK, find out why “life is like a hurricane!”
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 08:32:41. [CVDB271445]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jose Massaroli, Leonel Castellani, Magic Eye Studios
ComicInfo.Inker: Jose Massaroli, Leonel Castellani, Magic Eye Studios
ComicInfo.Characters: Argus McSwine, Azure Blue, Black Pete, Camile Chameleon, Chisel McSue, Curator, Daisy Duck, Dewey, Donald Duck, Emil Eagle, Farquardt, Fethry Duck, Flintheart Glomgold, Huey, Jeeves, Jelly Belly the Jellyfish, Launchpad McQuack, Louie, Ma Beagle, Magica De Spell, Molay, Moliarty, Mrs. Beakley, Phantom Blot, Rockerduck, Sebastian, Sharky, Uncle Scrooge, Webby
